StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruitersByDatePeriod]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int, @StartDate date.me, @EndDate date.me ) AS
SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + P.LAST_NAME DisplayName, rp.rowguid ,RP.TOUR_BEGIN_DATE ,RP.TOUR_END_DATE
FROM MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_PERSON RP WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON RP.ORGANIZATION_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.PERSON P ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID --INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ROLE RR ON RP.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = RR.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID WHERE RP.ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID and ((RP.TOUR_BEGIN_DATE<@EndDate and (RP.TOUR_END_DATE is null or RP.TOUR_END_DATE>=@EndDate)) or (RP.TOUR_END_DATE<@EndDate and RP.TOUR_END_DATE>=@StartDate and RP.TOUR_END_DATE is not null))
